description: Nicholas Kristof follows the former president as he travels into the wilds of Ethiopia to help find a cure for river blindness.
title: Carter vs. the Worms
title_page: Carter vs. the Worms - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Nicholas Kristof, an Op-Ed columnist and winner of two Pulitzer Prizes, brings attention to human rights abuses and social injustices around the world. Read his columns.
